alert.note: Alert for Baker; Inland Nassau; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, central Baker, western Duval and south central Charlton Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 648 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Glen St. Mary, or 19 miles north of Raiford, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Taylor, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, St. George and Sanderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
